But this is an area where you have a big advantage and have already figured out you have a margin of nearly 20 feet, if nothing goes wrong and if the ground below is level [which it isn't]. Dicy, distinctly dicy. Still, you are not about to let the princess escape you this way.
Down you go. As you approach, you see the princess is staring at you, with hope? on her face. Could she not realize yet that you are no longer her toy? Well, that can wait. The ground below won't.
So far, all according to schedule...Time to flip over and slip under her to give her a place to land. Of course, flipping over gives you an unwelcome view of the approaching earth too, but you keep your cool.
She lands with barely a thump and your arms grab her as she grabs them. Very good. Now flip over and full power to stop this fall.

It would be nice if you could fly directly up. Then you could break your fall and land, if necessary, without a thump. But you can't manage that steep an angle, at least for long. Instead, you must go forward and up, which makes your intended flight plan something of a U, if there is nothing at the botton to hit. And that is the tricky part. There has been no time to choose a path and if there is a hill, or even a big tree, in the way, things will get messy. But you think your path is clear...

...almost clear.
As you pancake the ground, revelling in your success, you suddenly see the one stupid big tree right in your way. You swerve to avoid it. There may be enough room...
13122121.title: Rescue

131221211.content:
A couple of feet to either side and this would be a mere bother, but that tree has to be dead in your way. And you are on the very edge of your ability to control your path. There is no way you can avoid coming all too close to it. [well no good way. A real sharp twist will avoid the tree, and send you plowing into the ground at top speed. You'd end up being a mile long skid mark. Just maybe you would survive that, but the princess won't, and you would be so broken and battered that you would only survive until something found the trail of blood and followed it to you, and dinner.]

You bank to one side, overstrained muscles trying to get that tiny degree of path change that will save you. It's going to be close, very close. You can even imagine coming just close enough that you escape, but the princess is knocked out of your arms. [A picture that causes you to clutch her as close as you can. You did not go to all this risk just to let her escape at the last moment.]

For a second, you wish you were human. For the princess, terrified and whimpering as she is, this will all be over before she can fully grasp the danger. But a gryphon thinks much faster in such situations. Very useful in the air when decisions must be quick, and right, or you are dead, but right now it means you have a "long" time to watch that tree approach and get bigger and more in your way...

Then you are going past it, and away from it, up into open air where you are in your element. Success! For a moment you understand those crazy thrillseekers who seeks such danger for the sheer joy of overcoming it. Not that you have any intention of ever being one, but at least you know they are not completely insane.

Even more important, you now have a helpless princess. Clutched in your paws, she can only cling to you. Even if she wanted, she can't get loose or bother you...

Well, maybe bother you...
Clutched to your chest, she is a lot "closer" to you than on your back. You feel your loins starting to stir. Yes, definitely you are going to have her before you eat her.
You wonder for a moment why she, and human females [among some other races] are so sexually attractive. She doesn't look at all like a hen should. She really ought to bore you. But human females are anything but boring. Strange, tho a good deal of fun.
Maybe it's a survival tactic. They may not like being raped, but it's better than being eaten, and a lot of monsters are "gentle" with women because they have other uses for them besides food. Maybe...
Well, it doesn't really matter. What does is that you are getting hot and have the means to take care of that, right in your paws. You start looking around for a place to have a quick bang. Nothing too obvious. Maybe best to just hold off until you reach the mountains.
131221211.title: success

1312212112.content:
Sigh, nothing that really looks good. It's got to be a place where she can't escape, and where nothing else can sneak up on you while you are "occupied", and you want to be able to land and take off easily, and... A lot of places that might do, but nothing that really suits.
And you do want a really good spot where you can really concentrate on the princess. She has made your life a misery for years. You are not going to let her escape any more of that payback than you can help. It just won't do to use a spot where you can't put your full attention on her. Well, the mountains are all but here now, and you should find a good spot soon enough. Just have to have a little patience...

Ah, there is a quite nice aiery ahead. Just the sort a gryphon would love. It must have a great view of the countryside and it will be impossible for the princess to escape from it. A skilled climber with just the right equipment, maybe, but the princess? not a chance. And there is even a good nest there that some previous gryphons had built.

And maybe still live in...
From out of the nest jumps a large male gryphon who bellows a challenge at you as he launches himself into the air. You are going to have to best him if you want to live here. And he is big, fast, and healthy.

You would sneer if your beak were mobile. You are big, fast, and healthy too. In fact better than your foe on all these points, you are sure. You have 50-100 lbs of muscle on him, can beat him in a race by lengths and still turn inside him. And your beak and claws...claws?
That's right. You are carrying that blasted princess in your arms. You would literally be fighting with one hand tied down, and most of the time, both hands. That's going to make the fight a lot tougher, even before you consider the risk of losing your grip or a random strike killing the princess and robbing you of all your revenge. Suddenly the battle does not look nearly as attractive...
But run away from this uppity wimp? How will you stand the shame?
1312212112.title: home, sweet...

13122121122.content:
A convention gryphon fight has too many risks. Are there any special tactics you might try?

You really wish the princess was on your back right now. She has neglected her battle training just like everything else, and her gryphon lance is more for show than use, but no gryphon who has seen a gryphon lance in action, or even heard of one, is going to challenge one.
Much as you scorn everything human, you have to admit an experienced gryphon-human rider team is a fantastic weapon, way superior to a single gryphon, even a gryphon as good as you. Your best weapon is your dive, and when diving you can ram a gryphon lance all the way thru the other gryphon. And if it dives, your rider can just point the lance at it and it skewers itself. Facing one and lacking one of your own, your choices are flee or die.
But the princess is in your arms, not on your back, and it is going to be really hard to get her mounted in the little time you have.

Could you use the lance yourself? Not impossible. But frankly not that effective. Aerial combat takes all your attention even without having to think of that lance. You can only use it effectively by taking attention from keeping track of what you foe is doing, catching the right wind, your own maneuvers...all vital. It's not clear you would gain any net advantage.
Still, any sensible gryphon fears that lance. One mistake and it is dead. And fighting to the death is for human romances, not for any rational creature. Much better to run away and fight a safer foe. The other gryphon may well decide not to take the chance no matter how good the odds.
13122121122.title: tactics

131221211221.content:
The battle would be so much more in your favor if the princess were on your back, but how to get her there. Your foe is not going to wait while you land and let her climb back into the saddle. It has got to be something fast...

Let's see. Do a roll. Halfway around you toss her into the air. You complete the roll and she then lands on your back. It could work. Gryphon acrobatics are very popular at court and you have have seen a dozen riders jumping grypon to gryphon while in wild maneuvers. They could do this blindfolded.
They could. They are experienced professionals who had practiced their tricks until they had them down pat. You are smart and talented, but you have never really tried something like this. And the princess? Well, at least the 1st part of this doesn't require her to be much more than a dead weight, but she is still going to make some fast use of that empty head of her's.

Well, no better idea presents itself to you, and you are not going to run from this twirp, so...
Suddenly you are twisting and rolling. As the princess finds herself shifting from looking at the ground to sky, you fling her upward, a trick that really gets a scream out of her. But you are busy completing the roll and then trying to be under her when she comes down.
A sudden load on your back tells you you have succeeded at the 1st part. Not as well as you could have hoped, but if she did not land on the saddle, she at least is close, and not in immediate danger of falling off. You slow your speed as much as you can without stalling and dropping like a rock. Now it is largely her turn. She should be able to scramble into the saddle, bind herself in, and get the lance into action. Should be if she had paid the least attention to lessons she could be barely forced to attend, much less pay heed to.

You can see your foe is puzzled by your actions, but is not wasting his chance to get into a great diving position above you. If that ninny blows it, your situation is going to really blow.
131221211221.title: back in the saddle with you

choices: fly to nest and let the princess handle it
1312212112212.content:
As you do your best to fly slowly and flatly [much harder than flying fast], you can feel her start to move.
Good girl, into that saddle with you. Now remember the straps this time. No way you are going to stay on without them.
Amazing, she actually does remember them. Now time for you to rattle that gryphon lance to tell her to get it ready.
Now please don't stare at the diving gryphon and start thinking about how you are dead center for its dive. Get that lance in position to stop that dive! Don't drop it like you did last time...

Well, at least you don't see it dropping past you.

You have to continue to fly slow and straight. That makes you easy meat for your foe, but your rider is inexperienced to put it mildly. Any attempt to dodge will confuse her more than it will the other gryphon. And your ability to look back and up is poor as well. So you are pretty much confined to waiting to feel the impact of the diving gryphon, or to seeing it swoop past. You steal a glance that shows the girl is waving the lance in what is vaguely the right direction. You are not at all confident she will use it right, but will the other gryphon risk making a shish-ka-bob of himself? It takes a lot of nerve to aim right at that huge needle and hope it bobbles to the side at the crucial moment... Well, you will find out, all too soon...

Then there is a swoosh to your left and you see the other gryphon pulling out of his dive after passing you. You have done it!

Well, not fully. The enemy is trying to gain altitude to try a 2nd dive. He may have lost a round, but he is not ready to quit.
1312212112212.title: past the 1st hurdle

13122121122122.content:
You instinctively start to rise too. Higher altitude is not an advantage to surrender lightly, but a gasp stops you. You suddenly realize you have been flying all day, and some of that was with every muscle you had. You are far from exhausted, but you are shocked at how tired you actually are. There is just no way you can outfly that jerk who has been resting all day.

Instead you bank and fly to the nest. You expect the other gryphon will again try to dive at you, and you can only hope the princess will do her job again.

At least you can spare a few more glances upward now. Not that this is comforting. The gryphon is indeed diving, and the lance in the princess' control seems to waver all too much for your comfort. But there seems no alternative to your flying slowly and smoothly, and bracing yourself for the impact.

Then the gryphon is diving past you on the right, a good deal closer. Apparently he held off until the last second, but then gave up.

But not fully. He flies in front of you and starts flying at you, a last stand. You joggle the lance a bit to remind the princess to aim the lance forward, which she does, and you leap forward.

The two of your rapidly close. To the observer, it might seem the two of you will hit. But your foe has already flinched twice, and can see your determination now. He will flinch again. Still, if he does, he is accepting your dominance, and that this is now your nest... Desperation has steeled many a spine...

But not this one. Your foe bows his head and dives beneath you. The princess, not realizing what is happening, tries to lower the lance to hit him anyway, but you have no problem in soaring up enough to cause her to miss.

As you watch your foe fly away to find a nest somewhere else, you can hear the princess cheering. Just what she is saying is not clear to you, but she is clearly thrilled by her victory, which can be considered a good one for an undertrained novice. In fact, you are actually feeling something positive towards the princess.
But you keep that under control as you head in for a landing. Your revenge will be starting in just a few minutes.
13122121122122.title: victory

choices: Why should I listen at all?
131221211221222.content:
You land in your new home, which you find quite a bit above par for a gryphon lair. Plenty of room for you and a mate to sleep, with room for the eggs as well. The height assures you that few pests will come calling. And the grounds below look to be good hunting. The former owner kept the nest itself in good repair too. Yes, a very nice home.

The princess too is pleased with the place. Could it be she still thinks you are just being notionate and will go back to being a beast of burden in the morning? Is she really so ignorant of how much peril she is in?
So it would seem. She is clearly more concerned with the chance to get her feet back on the earth than with your claws and beak. You let her keep her bliss for a moment longer as you consider what torture to start with.

Rape is definitely near the top. The day's events have really got you stroked. But there are a few preliminaries you want to consider 1st. Terrorize her until she offers herself for the false hope of safety? Just attack and take your time beating down her feeble defenses? Or...

"This looks like a good time for me to interrupt."

You understand the statement, which means you know who spoke even as you turn to look. The GryphonMaster, the one individual you may hate more than the princess. The man who trained you and whose orders ruled your daily life these past years. "Firm, but fair", hah! You will show him some firmness... You are pouncing on his smiling figure even as you hear the princess yell for you to stop.

A quick easy pounce and you will be paying back a lot of humiliation. The princess may have some "redeeming characteristics" that will keep her alive for a little while, but this man dies! You leap..
And miss.
How could you? Well, never mind. Turn and attack before he can escape. You attack...and miss again.
This can't be. In fact... Your third attack is more exploratory than really attacking. And as you were sort of expecting, your paw goes right thru him without touching anything, or bothering him in the slightest.
"Yes, this is just an illusion. You can't hurt me at all. Nor should you want to. I am here as your friend and assistant. We have quite compatiable goals and a little co-operation can be quite beneficial for you.

!@#$ magic. You wish you knew how to overcome whatever trick he is using, but you don't. So if you can't hurt him, the alternatives are fleeing or listening, and this place should not be given up that easily. You acknowledge you will listen [until you figure out how to hurt him].

The princess is blathering something and the GryphonMaster suggests he deal with her 1st.
131221211221222.title: A new friend?

choices: knock her around a bit for starters.
1312212112212221.content:
You don't see how you can stop him from talking to the princess, other than by finishing her off too quickly, so you merely indicate your displeasure. He manages to lessen that, by adding "You will be able to understand both of us."

So it seems. The princess is saying "..has been awfully hard to manage, tho it has all been really exciting.
"But when is my escort going to arrive? And they will be bringing proper bedding? I see no place here suitable for a princess."

"My lady, the bad news is that your escort will not be coming at all."

"But that is unacceptable. I can't be camping out here by myself. You see to it that they get here Now, and make sure they bring along a good cook too.

"I can't do that."

"WHAT? You do it, or I will get Father to punish your misbehavior."

"But I will try to save your life."

"Don't be silly. I am in no danger."

"You are in a gryphon nest with a gryphon who hates you very much."

"Nonsense, Fluffy would never hurt me, would you?"

Your response is a cry, a cry that is well known to the princess. You use it when you warn all the other gryphons that the prey is your's. Even one as blissfully ignorant as the princess has to realize you are calling her your meat.

"You wouldn't!?" But she is realizing you would, and will.
1312212112212221.title: comes the dawn

choices: More detail on what you are to do
13122121122122211.content:
If you have your way about it, and there is every reason to think you will, the princess is going to die at your claws and beak, very painfully and very slowly. But you can only kill her once, so if you don't have to rush, you don't want to. Ratchet the fear and terror up slowly, with her 'knowing' she is going to end in your belly, making each moment for her a tiny bit worse than the one before... Yes, a very good program.
And that means not damaging her, yet. 1st, she can be scared, then scared a lot, then terror. Then you can start the actual hurting..

But for now you answer the princess' appeal for you not to hurt her with a slash of a paw. It is not designed to actually hit her, just be an attack you would not have even dared start before. And it will hit if she does not dodge. For a moment, she looks at your swinging paw as if she is just stunned, but finally manages to jump back, only barely keeping her feet. The fear on her face is quite satisfying, maybe enough payback for giving you a name like Fluffy. But she has a very long list of other humiliations to answer for and you see no way she can pay for even most of them other than fatally, and no interest in finding a way.

"Now that you understand your situation a bit better, madam, I suggest you remain quiet while I explain to your new master why he should spare you."

"Master?"

"Yes, you are now a slave of this Gryphon, with no choice but to do whatever he demands of you.
"Which is the 1st reason you should not be too hard on her" he continues, turning to you. "You have always found the stableboys and their grooming enjoyable. Now the princess Lara can serve you in that role, keeping the place and you clean and grooming you."

"I'll do no such thing."

"You will if you want to survive."

A growl from you confirms that and the proud princess cowers.
You have to admit the man has a point. A nest can get messy and so can you for that matter. Nothing you can't handle for yourself, but it is a bother, and you have to admit these humans can do a better job at it. Having the princess as a slave would be an improvement of your lifestyle. Still, years of her slaving away will not make up for years of you being a slave. If you decide a slave is that useful, you can capture some peasant lass. Maybe you will hold off a few days while she slaves, but...

"Now, the next reason is that if you spare the princess Lara, I can aid you in also capturing Princess Sandra, and her mount."

The other princess? Just another human for the most part. You of course wouldn't mind mounting her, and she will make a nice meal of course, but she is nothing important.
But her mount? That's a hen!, a mate ready for breeding. The sort of thing males kill and get killed over. That is offering you fantastic treasure! You don't think you would trade the princess for the hen, but the idea is thinkable. You have to admit you want to hear more.

"The basic idea is fairly simple. You will fly back to the palace, apparently the victim of some disaster. I can supply you with a message apparently from Princess Lara that will beg for immediate help, and I can arrange that no aid will be immediately available, except for Princess Sandra. The girl is good hearted, and quite impetuous. She will quickly mount up and follow you, back to here I presume, where you can take her prisoner and have another servant girl for your pleasure."

"That's treason!"

"Indeed so. And it was treason for me to arrange for your escort to be late when I knew you would be too impatient to wait, and when I was well aware the gryphon was eager to escape, and treason to apply some 'alterations' to your equipment that seriously weakened your ability to deal with the situation, and treason to...do some other things."

"But why?"

"...I shall reserve that. I deem it most unlikely, but you just might escape somehow and pass the information on. There is no need for you to know more than that you and your sister are deemed in the way of certain friends of mine, but we still have hopes that you might be useful in the future. So you are the gryphon's property until we find a use for you. You are to be his good little slave and maybe he will let you live long enough to become our slave."

You have to admit the idea sounds good. Letting the princess live is no small thing, but if you get a hen.. And if you get hen and princess, her continued survival is your decision anyway.
Still, it is best not to appear too eager. So some demands should be made no matter how willing you are to agree. So what to ask?
13122121122122211.title: a plot

choices: political - wants to promote some group or person
131221211221222111.content:
Just why is he doing this? Not that you mind at all, but it is still strange and that makes you worry this help is bait on some hook.

"My reasons don't really concern you, but if you must know.."
131221211221222111.title: explanation

131221211221222112.content:
It probably doesn't matter why he is doing this. Likely just some human reason anyway. Maybe he wants to bow to one human king instead of another. Rather stupid in your view. He still has to bow.
But if he wants a different king, those who back the current king often show even less sense and insist on bowing to the old king's chicks. All sorts of fuss can result. That means killing the entire royal family can be a good idea. Alternately, marrying into the old royal family is sometimes done.
That would make sense, at least as much as you can expect from humans anyway. They hide the princesses with you and then will fetch one back to be queen if needed. That could be what he is up to.

Of course this is all speculation and could be entirely wrong. And it doesn't really matter. You could be getting that hot hen, and a couple of servants as a bonus. Who cares what those silly humans do in their palace?

But just what are you to do? And what risks will you be taking for this reward? It better not be too great. There are plenty of other gryphon hens around. It may not be easy to find one, but it is pretty much just a matter of looking. So what are the details?

"I thought you would find the deal attractive. Just to encourage you, I'll remind you that the royal stable has a large number of hens, hens that we will be breeding. If things go very well for us, you will have a harem at your command. We should be able to arrange to meet other of your needs too."

Not as an attractive an offer as a human might find it, but definitely interesting. Having a lot of chicks, and somebody else to do all the work involved... That has to be a tempting offer. Of course there are those "ifs" and "maybes" involved. Still, it does give you reason not to kill this !@#$ when you get the chance. Turning him into dinner as soon as you get the chance was certainly on the short list of things to do.

"Now, you should remain here for the next 2 days. I assume you will indulge yourself with Princess Lara. Do try to keep in mind that we want her to live.
"By the 3rd day, the hunt for her will have moved away from the palace area. You will sneak in to the Princess' playhouse. I will be waiting for you there, and we will dress you up like there has been a nasty attack you just barely survived. I also have a few gifts for you there.
"From there, you will fly to the palace and the stable. Just do your best to look to be on your last breath as you stagger in.
"Princess Sandra will there wanting to get any news as soon as possible. The king will have ordered her not to take part in the hunt for her sister, but when you give her the note saying her sister is in terrible danger and needs help immediately, she will leap onto her hen and insist you fly to her sister.
"You of course will do just that, and I expect you will have no problem making her your prisoner. You will need to keep the ladies here for about a week. You can have your fun with them, but we may want them back. So you can use any idle time to dream up ransom demands. I will contact you and arrange details.
"Beyond that, who can say? There are just too many factors. But who knows? Perhaps you will soon be the 1st king of the gryphons."

That's a title you doubt you want. Why bother with all the disputes between your "subjects"? And your subjects would be even more bother since they would object to your ruling. Leave that sort of title to humans. Still, having every other gryphon defer to you has appeal.

However, that can wait. Since the deal seems reasonable, it is time for the princess to start learning her new role as your toy.
131221211221222112.title: it's a deal

1312212112212221121.content:
As you make your acceptance to the deal, you are really sorry the princess is going to have to survive your revenge. It is just not going to be full revenge while she is alive, and she would be a tasty meal as well. Well, it will be fun dominating her and she will be useful. You can't expect to win all the time.

But obviously the princess is going to need "training" in her new duties. And this seems like a good time to start. She must learn to obey your every wish, so it is time to give her some orders.

First, she is to strip. She doesn't understand at 1st, but a few gestures from you and suggestions from the GryphonMaster give her the idea. You had expected some resistance, but she seems very aware of what your claws and beak can do, and your willingness to use either. So her only resistance is to only take off one item at a time. You are going to have to break her of that habit, but right now it is pleasant enough to just see one new treasure at a time.

The princess is a striking figure. A tall blond with plenty of figure at hips and chest, she is arguably one of the great beauties of the day. Certainly one would have to travel a good distance to find a better.
The GryphonMaster for one is not interested in doing that travel. He is instead watching avidly.

"Please, can't you give me a little privacy?"

"By no means. Your desires are not important. Only obeying your master here. The sooner and more completely you learn that, the better, and that means you learn you have no privacy. Putting you on public display will make a better slave of you."

The comment likely was meant for you more than for the princess. And you have to agree it makes sense. You can't say you want this [former?] enemy getting joy of the princess' misfortune, but he is right. Her very desire for him to leave is a reason for him to stay. You merely growl and issue an order for her to get back to stripping.

A moment later her twin beauties are on display. A very nice rack, you have to say. Firm and large. You are enjoying this a lot. So on to further treats.
Her flying pants come off, and then her formal pants, revealing a splendid set of legs and her small clothes. Another growl and she is showing you her hair color is entirely natural. She tries to cover for a moment, but one last growl and she is fully open to your inspection.

As you and your friend? drink your fill of this wonderful sight, you consider what should be next on the program. The GryphonMaster has several suggestions, mostly lewd.
1312212112212221121.title: strip

13122121122122211212.content:
How about the princess providing a little entertainment? Singing doesn't sound like much, but a dance could be ok. The GryphonMaster suggests the laylow...

"That dance is obscene! No decent woman would dance it."

"And just how did a proper princess like you pretend to be learn that?"

That produces an angry blush, and silence. In any case, if she doesn't like the idea, then you do, and you order her to dance. A flick of a claw eliminates any protest and she starts a dance she is rather poor at. However, the princess is right. The dance is extremely obscene and thus easy for you to like.

It is obscene enough to make it time for some physical contact with the princess. Not yet time for union with her. That can wait. But it is definitely coming. For now...
13122121122122211212.title: dancing

131221211221222112121.content:
Now you approach the princess, who manages to stand her ground. Not that there is any place to run, but you had expected her to cower against the sides of the nest.

No big matter. You pause to smell her. The scent is quite inviting. You are torn between the desire to mate with her and to eat her. For the moment, you want to do neither. Mating is definitely coming, and eating is still an option, but both should wait.

Still, you can take a taste now...

Your tongue comes out and starts licking the girl's breast. The lass seems to think this is to be followed by a bite [not a bad idea, but...] and this breaks her nerve and she tries to get away, quite unsuccessfully of course. You are irritated and order her back to you. Getting control of herself, and seeing no alternative, she slowly gets close to your beak.

This time you put your tongue between her legs. You find her taste exquisite. She is naturally not as thrilled and is only restrained from another escape attempt by a growl from you. So she stays and suffers.
However it seems her suffering is not as extreme as she had expected, at least not in the way she had thought. The gleeful presence of the GryphonMaster is almost unbearable to her. But your physical violations are first bearable, and then desirable. You deem this interesting and continue to lick and she continues to get more excited. It takes a considerable period, but her passion continues to build until it can't be contained.
You find her climax a tad disappointing. Her juices taste heavenly, but it is not at all a dramatic event, no screaming or collapse. So you try again, an attack that meets only objections to the GryphonMaster's presence, objections you ignore.
She comes 5 times before you decide you have had enough. She just doesn't come that hard. Well, maybe with different tactics later.

The GryphonMaster is again suggesting she be made to take an oath of loyalty. But he agrees it can wait until after she goes down on you.
131221211221222112121.title: licking

1312212112212221121212.content:
You have pleasured her. It is only fair she now pleasure you. More important, it is what you want. So you give a growl to order her into position. She doesn't understand at 1st, and when the GryphonMaster explains that she is now to taste you, she protests loudly.
The GryphonMaster derides her protests "Go ahead. You've done this before."
You aren't so sure. The GryphonMaster explains that she is now legally your property. Even if she were to escape and return home to become queen, you could simply order her back her and she would be required to come. "Now I must take care of other matters. Remember, on the 3rd day, sneak back to the Princess' playhouse. If things go as they should, you would not be spotted no matter how open you are, but best not take any chances. From there, we will start step 2 of this revolution."

So now what? Well, the nest could use a little cleaning, and you could use some grooming for that matter. Both tasks the princess...now the slave girl can do. Which should she do 1st?...
131221211221222112121221.title: you are mine

1312212112212221121212212.content:
Your personal comfort is the top priority of the moment. So you order the ex-princess to take off your harness. Of course, this takes a good deal of ordering to give her the idea what you want. And she is not as good at it as the groom you are used to [stupid chick neglected all of her studies, especially those involving work], so it takes her some time.
